body.scriptCode: todoist.create_task.setProjectId('95602'); todoist.create_task.setTaskContent('Task content'); todoist.create_task.setNote('Note'); todoist.create_task.setDueDate(''); todoist.create_task.setPriority('4'); todoist.create_task.setTaskDescription('This is a task from evernote'); evernote.create_note.setTitle('todois task'); evernote.create_note.setBody('task content'); evernote.create_note.setNotebook(''); evernote.create_note.setTags('#todoist');
